intro.description:
Prerequsites:
Create project with data
Load detector information

item.title: Specify experiment type
item.description: Select SAXS and/or WAXS checkboxes in "NCD Detector parameters" view to process SAXS and/or WAXS data, respectively. For each detector select dimension (1D/2D) and specify pixel size (if not preloaded).

item.title: Specifying data processing results directory
item.description: Specify directory where data processing results will be stored in the "Directory" field in the "NCD Data Reduction Parameters" view. This directory can be selected by pressing adjacent "..." button and selecting the directory from the dialog.

item.title: Select pipeline stages
item.description: Pipeline stages are selected in "Data Reduction Pipeline" panel. Indexes indicate order of pipeline execution.

item.title: Specifying Detector Response parameters
item.description: If "1. Detector Response" stage is enabled we need to specify detector response parameters under "Reference Data" group.

subitem.label: Reference to the file with detector response data needs to be specified in "Detector Response File" field. This can be accomplished either by selecting the appropriate file in Project Explorer and selecting NCD > Set as Detector Response File in popup menu or pressing "..." button next to the input field and selecting the file in file dialog. Detector response file should contain only single frame.

item.title: Specifying Sector Integration parameters
item.description: If "2. Sector Integration" stage is enabled we need to specify parameters under the "Sector Integration Parameters" group.

subitem.label: To enable calculation of radial and azimuthal profiles select corresponding checkboxes.
"Fast Integration" checkbox activates faster but less accurate algorithm for sector integration.
"Apply Detector Mask" checkbox adds detector mask into inrtegrated profile calculations.

item.title: Specifying Normalisation parameters
item.description: If "3. Normalisation" stage is enabled we need to specify normalisation parameters under "Reference Data" group.

subitem.label: Select detector name holding normalisation values from "Normalisation Data" drop-down list.
Specify channel number that holds normalisation values in "Channel" spinner.
Specify scaling value for normalisation data in "Abs. Scale" field (optional).

item.title: Specifying Background Subtraction parameters
item.description: If "4. Background Subtraction" stage is enabled we need to specify background subtraction parameters in "Reference Data" group.

subitem.label: Reference to the file with background data needs to be specified in "Background Subtraction File" field. This can be accomplished either by selecting the appropriate file in Project Explorer and selecting NCD > Set as Background Subtraction File in popup menu or pressing "..." button next to the input field and selecting the file in file dialog.
Background data can be rescaled using values specified in "Bg. Scale" field (optional).

item.title: Slicing input data (optional)
item.description: If only part of the input or background data needs to be used the corresponding frame interval can be specified in "Data frame selection" and "Background frame selection" groups. If "First" frame is omitted, data will be selected from the first frame in the dataset. If "Last" frame is omitted, data will be selected until the last frame in the dataset.

item.title: Running data reduction
item.description: Select single file or multiple files (by holding SHIFT or CTRL) for data reduction in "Project Explorer" view, right-click on them and select "NCD > Run Data Reduction" menu option.

item.title: Data reduction results
item.description: Data reduction results are stored in output directory in results_detectorname_DDMMYY_HHMMSS_inputfilename.nxs file under "/entry1/detectorname_processing/" node. Every data reduction stage has separate subnode with output result stored under data subnode. Output dataset of NCD data reduction is stored in "/entry1/dtectorname_result/data" node.
